body: Please note that, for years, there is an existing [goyacc](https://godoc.org/github.com/cznic/goyacc) project. If the x/tools/goyacc will overwrite the goyacc binary, it will break things for users of, for example, [ql](https://github.com/cznic/ql), [cc](https://github.com/cznic/cc), [pl0](https://github.com/cznic/pl0), [gc(WIP)](https://github.com/cznic/gc), ...
